title: Like cooking? Open a restaurant with minimal overhead.
text: As of May 2021, in Utah, you can get approved as a 'microenterprise' which allows you to sell food out of your home. Without the need to have a restaurant location, you can now flexibly run a restaurant with little to no overhead cost! We will make it easy take care of the details, getting you up and running as soon as possible. We offer a guided service to get approved, as well as a platform to advertise and run your at home restaurant through. You can be open daily, or sell one-off meals when you decide to cook a little extra. Contact us below to learn more!
